title: Topic 03 Question 18
body: You have an Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pool named Pool1 and a database named DB1. DB1 contains a fact table named Table.
You need to identify the extent of the data skew in Table1.
What should you do in Synapse Studio?
options: Connect to Pool1 and query sys.dm_pdw_nodes_db_partition_stats.
Connect to the built-in pool and run DBCC CHECKALLOC.
Connect to Pool1 and run DBCC CHECKALLOC.
Connect to the built-in pool and query sys.dm_pdw_nodes_db_partition_stats.
